About Me

A blend of technical expertise and strategic project leadership.

Driven by Data, Built by Code

With a Master's in Applied Data Science and over six years of hands-on experience, I specialize in transforming complex data challenges into robust, automated solutions. My background spans from architecting large-scale ETL pipelines on Azure to developing user-centric web applications. As a Certified ScrumMaster, I excel in leading cross-functional teams to deliver high-impact projects ahead of schedule.

Core Competencies:

ETL & Data Pipelines Automation Database Management Azure Cloud Services Web Development IT Project Management Data Visualization REST APIs

Technical Skills

Languages

Python, SQL, R, C#, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, PowerShell

Tools & Platforms

Azure DevOps, Docker, Git, Power BI, SharePoint, Azure Data Factory

Frameworks & Libraries

Pandas, PySpark, PowerApps, .NET, Visual Studio

Professional Experience

A journey of growth and impact at Eurofins IT.

July 2022 – Aug 2024

Senior Software Engineer – Data Automation

Eurofins IT, Bangalore, India

  • Designed and implemented a scalable ETL data pipeline for 38 Azure tenants, centralizing data for compliance and reporting using Python and Azure Data Factory.
  • Led a 6-engineer team as Scrum Master for a multinational SharePoint data migration, delivering the project ahead of schedule.
  • Developed a PowerApps solution with SQL Stored Procedures, automating data entry across 146 locations and improving data consistency.
  • Automated the migration of 6TB of unstructured data from on-premise SharePoint to Azure Blob Storage and SharePoint Online.
  • Built M365 activity log ingestion pipelines, reducing audit time by 70% through automated data validation and transformation.
June 2018 – June 2022

Software Engineer

Eurofins IT, Bangalore, India

  • Created and deployed scheduled jobs using Azure DevOps to consolidate application logs from 18 servers into a unified database.
  • Developed the Eurofins travel request portal, reducing processing time from 10 days to 3 and enabling real-time cost analysis with Power BI.
  • Built a C# web app to manage and surface dynamic email distribution lists (1600+ entries) to over 60,000 users via SharePoint.

Featured Projects

Applying data science and engineering skills to real-world problems.

Sentiment Analysis Pipeline

Engineered a Python-based sentiment analysis pipeline that scraped Amazon & Peloton reviews, processed data with PySpark, and delivered interactive insights via a Streamlit dashboard.

FIFA Striker Market Value Predictor

Developed a regression model in R leveraging player performance, physical attributes, and stats to forecast football strikers' market value, empowering smarter scouting and investment decisions.
